title: ICE: compiler/rustc_typeck/src/collect/type_of.rs:186:25: no arg matching AnonConst in path

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
I'm seeing an internal compiler error on the following input, found by [fuzz-rustc](https://github.com/dwrensha/fuzz-rustc): ### Code ```Rust fn main() { 0: u8=e> } ``` ### Error output ``` error[E0412]: cannot find type `e` in this scope --> src/main.rs:2:16 | 2 | 0: u8=e> | ^ | | | not found in this scope | help: maybe you meant to write an assignment here: `let e` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_typeck/src/collect/type_of.rs:186:25: no arg matching AnonConst in path thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1169:9 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace ``` The ICE happens after correctly reporting another error, so low priority. Affected versions: I tried nightly 2021-11-25 and stable 1.56.1 and they both show the same ICE.
Backtrace

``` Compiling playground v0.0.1 (/playground) error[E0412]: cannot find type `e` in this scope --> src/main.rs:2:16 | 2 | 0: u8=e> | ^ | | | not found in this scope | help: maybe you meant to write an assignment here: `let e` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_typeck/src/collect/type_of.rs:186:25: no arg matching AnonConst in path thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1169:9 stack backtrace: 0: std::panicking::begin_panic:: 1: std::panic::panic_any:: 2: ::bug 3: ::bug 4: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt::::{closure#0}, ()> 5: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt:: 6: rustc_middle::util::bug::bug_fmt 7: rustc_typeck::collect::type_of::opt_const_param_of 8: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::>> 9: ::opt_const_param_of 10: rustc_typeck::check::typeck 11: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::> 12: ::typeck 13: ::par_body_owners:: 14: rustc_typeck::check::typeck_item_bodies 15: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::> 16: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query:: 17: ::time::<(), rustc_typeck::check_crate::{closure#7}> 18: rustc_typeck::check_crate 19: rustc_interface::passes::analysis 20: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::>> 21: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query:: 22: ::enter::> 23: ::enter::, rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> 24: rustc_span::with_source_map::, rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#1}> 25: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run::, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}> 26: >::set::, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.58.0-nightly (dd549dcab 2021-11-25) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C codegen-units=1 -C debuginfo=2 --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [opt_const_param_of] computing the optional const parameter of `main::{constant#0}` #1 [typeck] type-checking `main::{constant#0}` #2 [typeck_item_bodies] type-checking all item bodies #3 [analysis] running analysis passes on this crate end of query stack For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0412`. error: could not compile `playground` due to previous error ```
